snippet: A survey punctured the illusion that our high-priced health care system provides faster service than the national systems in other advanced countries.
abstract: Editorial warns Americans will experience even longer waits for doctor's appointments after millions of previously uninsured are covered under Affordable Care Act; points out wait times in America are longer than those in most advanced countries with national health systems; contends solution to problem lies in making reduction of wait times a political issue.
lead_paragraph: A survey punctured the illusion that our high-priced health care system provides faster service than the national systems in other advanced countries.

headline.main: The Long Wait to See a Doctor
headline.print_headline: The Long Wait to See a Doctor

keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
keywords.name: subject
